title: ERROR CODE 004 (PLEASE HELP)
body: This new patch has made my client unplayable to the max! Each time I open my client I receive a message saying "Patching failed and we're not sure why. Please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004)" goes on forever and ever giving me the same message. Any suggestions?!? I've tried to run as admin and also restarting my pc.

replies.body:
Is this happening on the updated client?  What happens if you load the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Let me know if you run into any errors, and when exactly it's happening.

My client will open but the message pops up right away.  Won't even allow me to click on the "Launch Legacy Client". I went to the files and tried to launch from there and it seemed to work yet pulls up the new client again with the same message!!
i did that but when i logged back in, the same error message keeps popping up
